name: Monster Mush Trials
description:
A small project I worked on throughout my Game Scripting I course. It's a short and simple 3D fantasy platformer where you play as a mushroom monster and traverse through a dungeon where you meet many NPCs with quests and charming dialogue.

Controls:

Arrow keys - movement

Z - Hold to attack

X - Jump

Esc - Menu

Mouse - Navigate menu

Note: Save button on start menu currently has no functionality
